Author: mdolon
Content: What makes it even more amazing is that it has a business model.  Great to see a fresh, simple and smart execution of a useful tool.

Author: deramisan
Content: It bugs me that downmodded comments trash karma - political disagreements often get downmodded not because they aren't valid, but because someone disagrees fundamentally. That doesn't seem right.
